issue.title: Update constant-time suppression files for Sphincs+ and McEliece generic configuration
issue.body:
Running the constant-time tests with the `generic` optimization target (`cmake -GNinja -DOQS_DIST_BUILD=OFF -DOQS_OPT_TARGET=generic -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DOQS_ENABLE_TEST_CONSTANT_TIME=ON ..`) results in failures for Sphincs+ and McEliece. We haven't been running CT tests for these algorithms in CI and until recently we weren't running CT tests for the `generic` target due to a [CI configuration bug](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/pull/1618).

The full constant-time tests need to be run (locally) with the generic configuration and the suppression files updated so that there are no more failures.

issue.title: build with openssl, built with shlib_variant
issue.body:
I try to build liboqs with openssl (-3.2.1), itself built from source using [openssl's shlib_variant](https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/master/Configurations/README.md?plain=1#L129-L149)

The build instructions at https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs?tab=readme-ov-file#linuxmacos
work for me, if I replace my own openssl version with a distribution's default version (= apt-get install libssl-dev)

But if I skip installing libssl-dev and use `cmake -GNinja -DOFF_OPENSSL_CRYPTO_LIBRARY=/usr/local/ ..`
I get errors like this:
```
...
[1197/1214] Linking C shared library lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev                                                                                                                     
[1198/1214] Building C object tests/CMakeFiles/speed_sig.dir/speed_sig.c.o                                                                                                        
[1199/1214] Creating library symlink lib/liboqs.so.5 lib/liboqs.so                                                                                                                
[1200/1214] Linking C executable tests/example_kem                                                                                                                                
FAILED: tests/example_kem                                                                                                                                                         
: && /usr/bin/cc -g -O2 -fdebug-prefix-map=/tmp=. -fstack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wl,-z                       ,noexecstack tests/CMakeFiles/example_kem.dir/example_kem.c.o -o tests/example_kem  -Wl,-rpath,/tmp/liboqs/build/lib  lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev  lib/liboqs-                       internal.so  -lm && :                                                                                                                                                             
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `RAND_status'                                                                                                       
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_CTX_free'                                                                                                   
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_DigestFinal_ex'                                                                                                
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `CRYPTO_THREAD_run_once'                                                                                            
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `RAND_bytes'                                                                                                        
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_DigestInit_ex'                                                                                                 
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_CTX_copy_ex'                                                                                                
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_DigestUpdate'                                                                                                  
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_free'                                                                                                       
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_fetch'                                                                                                      
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_CIPHER_fetch'                                                                                                  
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_CIPHER_free'                                                                                                   
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_CTX_new'                                                                                                    
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `RAND_poll'                                                                                                         
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status                                                                                                                                        
[1201/1214] Linking C executable tests/speed_common                                                                                                                               
FAILED: tests/speed_common                                                                                                                                                        
: && /usr/bin/cc -g -O2 -fdebug-prefix-map=/tmp=. -fstack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wl,-z                       ,noexecstack tests/CMakeFiles/speed_common.dir/speed_common.c.o -o tests/speed_common  -Wl,-rpath,/tmp/liboqs/build/lib  lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev  lib/libo                       qs-internal.so  -lm && :                                                                                                                                                          
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `RAND_status'                                                                                                       
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_MD_CTX_free'                                                                                                   
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `EVP_DigestFinal_ex'                                                                                                
/usr/bin/ld: lib/liboqs.so.0.10.0-dev: undefined reference to `CRYPTO_THREAD_run_once'                                                                                            
```

setting LDFLAGS, CFLAGS, FLAGS, LINK_FLAGS and CMAKE_FLAGS to `-L/usr/local/lib -lssl-local -lcrypto-local` doesn't change things.

What else could I do / should I try? Any other Information I should provide?

Thanks, 
Andreas
